item.title: My Mac Setup for Mobile Development - 2023
item.description: I bought the M2 Macbook Pro from 2022 after having used the M1 Macbook Pro 2021, here I'm sharing my setup for mobile and web development…
item.content:encoded: I bought the M2 Macbook Pro from 2022 after having used the M1 Macbook Pro 2021, here I'm sharing my setup for mobile and web development which I will try to keep up to date.

item.title: Securing AWS Lambda Function URL with Cognito
item.description: In this post, we'll try to secure a lambda function which is configured as AuthType equals , which means this is publicly available for…
item.content:encoded: In this post, we'll try to secure a lambda function which is configured as AuthType equals None, which means this is publicly available for anyone to execute.
